title: Friends List
body: Has anyone else friends list disparaged after this patch?

replies.body: As lonely as I am in real life...
The players affected that I've talked to have told me that it's all back up and working now. Anyone still having the issue?
Hey i just restarted my client and its back

I went in to settings -> Initiate full repair 

This fixed the issue for me - hope it helps! :)
Yeah. My friends list is wiped as well. Thought it was permanent so I tried to add friends again but it comes up with internal error.
Same here, also cant click the purchase rp button? anyone else also having this issue?
Yep, my friend list is completely wiped out. Tried logging out and back in several times but the problem still persists.
Yeah mine just disappeared just now

Yes 
they need to fix this immediatly
